Description: A green-glazed composition shabti-figure of a woman named Bak(et)-Khons. The surface is rather worn but still bears details in black paint showing a fillet around the head, hoes in the hands, a basket on the back and remains of an inscription down the front. The name on the figure is no longer legible but accompanying documentation indicates the figure was made for a certain Bakenkhons.
Curator's comments: Note about findspot now in archives under number AES Ar.2089
The collection contains a second shabti of the same woman (EA 71160; name there given as Baketnetkhons).
